nodes.text: Eric Ericsen was a male Mandalorian residing on Corellia in 3640 BBY, when he was killed.

Eric Ericsen appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Corellia. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
